mapper.select: SELECT pgs.*, teaminfoa.st_id as st_id, teaminfoa.team_id AS team_a_id, teaminfoa.t_name AS team_a_tName, teaminfoa.u_name AS team_a_uName, teaminfoa.u_nickName AS team_a_nickName, teaminfoa.t_image AS team_a_tImage, teaminfob.team_id AS team_b_id, teaminfob.t_name AS team_b_tName, teaminfob.u_name AS team_b_uName, teaminfob.u_nickName AS team_b_nickName, teaminfob.t_image AS team_b_tImage FROM playball_game_schedule pgs LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.team_id, pt.st_id, pt.t_name, pu.u_name, pu.u_nickName, pt.t_image FROM playball_team pt LEFT JOIN playball_users pu ON pu.u_id = pt.t_captain ) teaminfoa ON pgs.team_id = teaminfoa.team_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.team_id, pt.t_name, pu.u_name, pu.u_nickName, pt.t_image FROM playball_team pt LEFT JOIN playball_users pu ON pu.u_id = pt.t_captain ) teaminfob ON pgs.opponent_id = teaminfob.team_id WHERE pgs.game_status = 1 AND ! ISNULL( pgs.opponent_id ) AND ! ISNULL( pgs.team_id ) AND pgs.team_id = #{team_id} or pgs.opponent_id = #{team_id}

SELECT pgs.*, teaminfoa.st_id as st_id, teaminfoa.team_id AS team_a_id, teaminfoa.t_name AS team_a_tName, teaminfoa.u_name AS team_a_uName, teaminfoa.u_nickName AS team_a_nickName, teaminfoa.t_image AS team_a_tImage, teaminfob.team_id AS team_b_id, teaminfob.t_name AS team_b_tName, teaminfob.u_name AS team_b_uName, teaminfob.u_nickName AS team_b_nickName, teaminfob.t_image AS team_b_tImage FROM playball_game_schedule pgs LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.team_id, pt.st_id, pt.t_name, pu.u_name, pu.u_nickName, pt.t_image FROM playball_team pt LEFT JOIN playball_users pu ON pu.u_id = pt.t_captain ) teaminfoa ON pgs.team_id = teaminfoa.team_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.team_id, pt.t_name, pu.u_name, pu.u_nickName, pt.t_image FROM playball_team pt LEFT JOIN playball_users pu ON pu.u_id = pt.t_captain ) teaminfob ON pgs.opponent_id = teaminfob.team_id WHERE pgs.game_status = 1 AND ! ISNULL( pgs.opponent_id ) AND ! ISNULL( pgs.team_id ) AND pgs.id=#{id}
